author: admin
title: ConnectSolutions Talks #Skype4B ROI at ITExpo
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/2/2015 @ 2:26 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ConnectSolutions 
SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ConnectSolutions (CoSo), the trusted private-cloud solutions provider for Microsoft Skype for Business and a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, today announced CoSo Vice President of Skype Business Christopher Martini will be speaking on two panels at next week's ITExpo . The conference is being held in Anaheim, California from October 6-8, 2015. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151002/273542LOGO 
Tweet This : CoSo and MSFT Talk #Skype4B ROI at #ITExpo http://bit.ly/1FF4dBq via @CoSoCloud @ITEXPO 
A 20+ year industry veteran and former Microsoft executive, Mr. Martini will bring his Skype for Business and related Unified Communications expertise to the following panels: 
ROI with Skype for Business - Oct. 5 at 5 p.m. - Room 202A An investment in technology is never made without understanding what you're getting in return. We'll discuss how to maximize ROI not only on your Skype for Business investment, but also how Skype for Business will help increase the return on your entire communications infrastructure. 
Key Considerations for a Successful Skype for Business Deployment - Oct. 8 at 12:30 p.m. - Skype for Business Pavilion, Exhibit Hall Floor You've made the decision to modernize your telephony network through Skype for Business with Enterprise Voice - one of the most exciting technologies to come to Unified Communications in recent history. But with the promise of UC comes complexity. Through this talk you will learn about the four phases of a successful deployment journey as well as the truly transformational changes that Skype for Business with Enterprise Voice can bring to your communications enabled business processes. 
To register and learn more about the ITExpo, please visit: http://itexpo.tmcnet.com/west . 
Connect with ConnectSolutions: -- ConnectSolutions Blog -- LinkedIn -- Twitter 
About ConnectSolutions ConnectSolutions (CoSo), a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and Adobe Gold Solution Partner, is the trusted private-cloud solutions provider for Microsoft Skype for Business and Adobe Connect. With more than 8 billion minutes of cloud collaboration delivered, CoSo products, services, and unrivaled expertise are relied upon by mid-market businesses, global enterprises and government agencies to deliver a superior customer experience in the deployment and ongoing management of mission-critical collaboration solutions. 
The CoSo Suite of managed service offerings exceed the security, reliability and quality requirements of typical collaboration systems and are trusted by such commercial organizations as General Motors, KPMG, Citibank and Raytheon as well as such government organizations as the General Services Administration, FEMA, and the Transportation Security Administration. 
For more information about ConnectSolutions and the CoSo Suite, visit: http://connectsolutions.com 
Contact: Chris Blake
